items.title: Kevin Durant Reclaims Coinbase Access as 2016 Bitcoin Stake Climbs Over 17,700%
items.excerpt: Kevin Durant has regained access to a Coinbase account nearly a decade after being locked out, a development publicized on X by Brian Armstrong. The recovery comes as a 2016 Bitcoin purchase tied to Durant has surged in value, drawing commentary on CNBC and renewed scrutiny of Coinbase customer support.
